translations.chinese: 東陽甯君、沛公引兵西，與戰蕭西，不利，還收兵聚留。
translations.english: The Lord of Dongyang Ning and Pei Gong led troops west and battled west of Xiao, but were unsuccessful, so they retreated and gathered troops at Liu.
In the second month, they attacked Dang and captured it after three days.

translations.chinese: 收碭 兵，得六千人，與故合九千人。
translations.english: They recruited troops from Dang, getting six thousand men, and together with the previous troops made nine thousand.
In the third month, they attacked Xiayi and captured it.
They returned to attack Feng, but could not capture it.
